Texts.Chs: 把一个^orange;Radien纪念品^reset;带给^green;Radien商店^reset; (位于^orange;科学前哨站^reset;)
Texts.Eng: Bring a ^orange;Radien Relic^reset; to the ^green;Radien Shop^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 这是真的吗？一个^green;Vexinarri Glaff^reset;？你在哪里找到它的？我还以为只是个传说呢！如我所承诺的，这是你的回报。我很荣幸。
Texts.Eng: Can it truly be? A ^green;Vexinarri Glaff^reset;? Where did you find this?!?! I thought these were only a legend! As promised, your reward. It has been a pleasure.

Texts.Chs: 我就是你们所谓的收藏家，某种意义上的。我的人民对我们的过去知之甚少，而我的使命即是找到更多有关我们历史的资料。如果你找到了一个^orange;Radien遗物^reset;，你能把它带给我吗？我会非常感激的。
Texts.Eng: I am what you might call a collector, of sorts. My people have little knowledge of our past, and I make it my mission to find more information about our history. If you find a ^orange;Radien Relic^reset;, could you bring it back to me? I'd be ever so thankful.
